home.title: Hello, I am
home.description: Front End mobile application developer with a special focus on the Flutter framework, making use of presentation patterns like MVP, architectures like Clean Architecture, methods like Clean Code and Atomic Design, quality ISOS like 25010 and frameworks like SCRUM, resulting in a quality and user friendly product.

about.subtitle: Hi, I'm Here To Help Your Next Project!
about.description: With my experience as a Front End mobile application developer with a special focus on the Flutter framework, making use of presentation patterns like MVP, architectures like Clean Architecture, methods like Clean Code and Atomic Design, quality ISOS like 25010 and frameworks like SCRUM, resulting in a quality and friendly product to the end user.

portfolio.first-project-description: Apparel catalog and inventory management store
portfolio.second-project-description: Display important data of the latest movies in cinema through The Movie Database API (TMDB).
portfolio.third-project-description: Display and query books, as well as view their main features and scores through an API.
